input.message:
Žarko Milutinović leads **1 project**:

• **Operations – Serbia debottlenecking initiative** (status: active)
  - An internal cross-functional initiative to debottleneck key production stages at the Serbian plant.
  - His allocation: 0.5 FTE as Lead

Note: Žarko is also assigned to one other project (Loading ramp and dock floor system) but in an Ops role, not as Lead.
